data.title: Instacart's IPO filing sparked an online spat between cloud rivals Snowflake and Databricks
data.description: After Instacart published its IPO prospectus on Monday, a disclosure regarding the company's use of Snowflake technology created an unexpected controversy.

data.title: Tesla shares close down 5% after price cuts, Model 3 refresh
data.description: Tesla shares dropped Friday after the company cut prices on cars in the U.S.

data.title: Dell has best day on stock market since its relisting in 2018 after earnings sail past estimates
data.description: Dell shares surged more than 20% on Friday after the company reported better-than-expected earnings and revenue.

data.title: Dell has best day on stock market since its relisting in 2018 after earnings sail past estimates
data.description: Dell shares surged more than 20% on Friday after the company reported better-than-expected earnings and revenue.

data.title: Charter puts media companies on notice in bid to save pay-TV bundle
data.description: Charter Communications CEO Chris Winfrey wants to find a way for the pay-TV bundle to live, but content companies have to get on board.

data.title: Biden kept a Ford EV battery plant from going overseas. But not everyone is happy about it.
data.description: Ford was considering sites outside the U.S. but was lured to Michigan in part because of new federal tax credits that were part of the Inflation Reduction Act.

data.title: Bezos snubbed Musk's SpaceX for huge satellite launch contract, Amazon shareholder says
data.description: An Amazon shareholder lawsuit alleges the company snubbed SpaceX for satellite launch contracts because of Jeff Bezos' personal rivalry with Elon Musk.

data.title: Ford to replace rear cameras in new recall, take $270 million charge
data.description: It was the latest in a series of recalls for rear camera-related recalls by the No. 2 U.S. automaker in recent years.

data.title: Spectrum owner Charter calls pay-TV model broken as it battles Disney over blackout
data.description: Charter's customers lost access to Disney networks late Thursday as the two companies battle over contract fees and the pay-TV model.

data.author: Lou Del Bello
data.title: India's Rooftops See Solar Surge As Companies Seek Green Energy
data.description: India's Rooftops See Solar Surge As Companies Seek Green Energy
